channel.title: Spawn-Scape 614 is back under new management! JOIN TODAY!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/j9wrhl.png[/img]
Hello all. As of February 2015, Spawnscape has been put back online & re hosted yet again! This time around, we have a new owner and a much more sophisticated staff team. Also we have decided to change a few things around to benefit the server, here is the list of the new implementations. Bearing in mind Spawn-Scape is exactly how it used to be, with a few tweaks/changes. [/COLOR][/FONT]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29fxzqv.png[/img]
- No clipping fixed - Fully functional bank tabs - Duel arena - New PKing titles & skulls just like the old Spawn-Scape - New customized home location with NPCS/PNPCS - New flawless customized shops with fantastic items - New customized client with 9 fantastic themes, links to related sites in regards to Spawn-Scape - New ::ticket & ::help system - New high scores page - New ability to save armor sets for quick spawn navigation - New feature to where you can grab item ID'S in-game - New non-combat skills to train, such as Thieving, Fletching, Crafting, Herblore, Mining, & Agility - Completionist cape! (Named Castle-wars cape due to glitches) - HD graphics - HD textures - Client loader - Automatic Cache uploader - Working sounds - Customized voting/PkP shops with fantastic items - Customized player-tab with statistics for your account - Active clan battles - Gambling (60x2, BJ, Flower game) - High detail/Low detail - Fixed/Full screen effect - %100 working ancients - %100 working lunars - Accurate melee formulas - Accurate Hit formulas - Accurate magic formulas - Customized Cosmetic items - Ability to change your character title - Fantatstic GFX emotes for all Party-hats, Santas, & H'ween masks - Donatorzone (In construction) - Perfect hybridding/ 1ticking - Premium, Extreme, Prime, Dice statuses - Active, helpful staff members - Auto vote system - Auto donate system - A vast amount of Safe/Dangerous PK locations - Dicing zone - Clipped combat (like RS) - Clipped projectiles - Autocasting - All functional special attacks on all weapons - Working turmoil/curses prayer - Poisoning - 24/7 uptime - Frequent/daily updates - Flawless IPB forums
& many, many more features. Log in to experience the Spawn-Scape concept! You will not be disappointed!
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2i8ktx1.png[/img]
Home-page: [url=http://spawnscape614.org]Spawnscape - #1 Leading 614[/url] Forums: [url=http://spawnscape614.org/forum/]SpawnScape[/url] Vote: [url=http://Spawnscape614.org/vote]SpawnScape - Voting[/url] Donate: [url=http://spawnscape614.org/donate]Spawnscape - Donate[/url] Play: [url=http://spawnscape614.org/play]SpawnScape - Play[/url]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/28j89ht.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/oko654.png[/img]
Active dice-zone
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2v34g03.png[/img] Player-tabs for quick navigation
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/11qo5jq.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2d1ntcm.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/qy78mq.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2ivdyfl.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/k01r8n.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/15i7190.png[/img]
Active forums/community
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/10h1rat.png[/img]
Party-hat effects
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2zs8bpx.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/14npqbr.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2yzfo5k.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9a04g9.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/9jhvdt.gif[/img]
What are you waiting for? JOIN TODAY! Created by Yoshikazu.
[/CENTER]

item.title: Spawn-Scape 614 is back under new management! JOIN TODAY!
item.dc:creator: @Spawnscape_614 Spawnscape 614
item.description:
@Spawnscape_614 wrote:

[CENTER]

Hello all. As of February 2015, Spawnscape has been put back online & re hosted yet again! This time around, we have a new owner and a much more sophisticated staff team. Also we have decided to change a few things around to benefit the server, here is the list of the new implementations. Bearing in mind Spawn-Scape is exactly how it used to be, with a few tweaks/changes. [/COLOR][/FONT]

  • No clipping fixed
  • Fully functional bank tabs
  • Duel arena
  • New PKing titles & skulls just like the old Spawn-Scape
  • New customized home location with NPCS/PNPCS
  • New flawless customized shops with fantastic items
  • New customized client with 9 fantastic themes, links to related sites in regards to Spawn-Scape
  • New ::ticket & ::help system
  • New high scores page
  • New ability to save armor sets for quick spawn navigation
  • New feature to where you can grab item ID’S in-game
  • New non-combat skills to train, such as Thieving, Fletching, Crafting, Herblore, Mining, & Agility
  • Completionist cape! (Named Castle-wars cape due to glitches)
  • HD graphics
  • HD textures
  • Client loader
  • Automatic Cache uploader
  • Working sounds
  • Customized voting/PkP shops with fantastic items
  • Customized player-tab with statistics for your account
  • Active clan battles
  • Gambling (60x2, BJ, Flower game)
  • High detail/Low detail
  • Fixed/Full screen effect
  • %100 working ancients
  • %100 working lunars
  • Accurate melee formulas
  • Accurate Hit formulas
  • Accurate magic formulas
  • Customized Cosmetic items
  • Ability to change your character title
  • Fantatstic GFX emotes for all Party-hats, Santas, & H’ween masks
  • Donatorzone (In construction)
  • Perfect hybridding/ 1ticking
  • Premium, Extreme, Prime, Dice statuses
  • Active, helpful staff members
  • Auto vote system
  • Auto donate system
  • A vast amount of Safe/Dangerous PK locations
  • Dicing zone
  • Clipped combat (like RS)
  • Clipped projectiles
  • Autocasting
  • All functional special attacks on all weapons
  • Working turmoil/curses prayer
  • Poisoning
  • 24/7 uptime
  • Frequent/daily updates
  • Flawless IPB forums

& many, many more features. Log in to experience the Spawn-Scape concept! You will not be disappointed!

Home-page: Spawnscape - #1 Leading 614
Forums: SpawnScape
Vote: SpawnScape - Voting
Donate: Spawnscape - Donate
Play: SpawnScape - Play
